subject: ATTN
body:
ATTN
WE BRING TO YOUR NOTICE THE UNANIMOUS AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE HIGH COURT
OF THAILAND AND THE SIAM COMMERCIAL BANK WITH AN AUTHORIZATION FROM
THE THAILAND AUTHORITY INFORMING YOU THAT AFTER MUCH DELIBERATION, WE
HAVE AGREED THAT A COMPENSATION AMOUNT OF US$750,000.00 SHOULD BE
PROCESSED AND RELEASED TO YOU AS THE GOVERNMENT CANNOT AFFORD YOUR
PRINCIPAL SUM DUE TO ECONOMIC RECESSION.
IT IS EXPECTED THAT YOU FILL AND RETURN THE BENEFICIARY APPLICATION
FORM AS ATTACHED, THIS IS THE ONLY WAY WE CAN ATTEND TO YOU. MOST
IMPORTANTLY, PLEASE SCREW DOWN THE FORM AND GO THROUGH THE REMARK
SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS, WITHOUT WHICH WE CANNOT ATTEND TO YOU, THIS IS
BECAUSE AN APPLICATION AND REGISTRATION FEE OF $970.00 IS REQUIRED
FROM YOU, THIS FOR THE PROCESSING OF YOUR COMPENSATION FUND, WE DO NOT
WANT ANY SURPRISES ALONG THE WAY, AS IT IS STATED, YOU MUST MAKE THE
PAYMENT IF YOU MUST BE ATTENDED TO AND THE COURT WILL ISSUE YOU A
COURT ORDER WHICH WILL BE COPIED TO THE BANK FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE OF
YOUR FUNDS WITHOUT ANY DELAY.
IF THIS INTEREST YOU, KINDLY FILL THE FORM, SEND IT BACK TO ME AND I
WILL GIVE YOU DETAILS TO MAKE THE ONE OFF PAYMENT OF $970 ONLY.
IT IS IN OUR BEST INTEREST TO SERVE YOU BETTER AND THE COURT ASSURE
YOU THAT YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED.
YOURS IN LEGAL SERVICES.
MR. JOHN SLOSHAR
REGISTRAR
HIGH COURT OF THAILAND

subject: Re:   ATTN
body:
Hello Mr. John Sloshar,

Thank you for your message and the information provided. It's quite interesting to hear about this unanimous agreement between the High Court of Thailand and the Siam Commercial Bank.

I'm a bit confused though, could you please clarify what this is all about? I don't recall having any dealings with the High Court of Thailand or the Siam Commercial Bank. 

Also, you mentioned a form that needs to be filled out and returned, but I didn't see any attached to your message. Could you kindly resend it?

Lastly, regarding the payment you mentioned, could you provide more details on what exactly this fee is for? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara
